newsitem.title: USA: Bank of America forms alliance with D.E.Shaw.
newsitem.headline: Bank of America forms alliance with D.E.Shaw.

text.p: Bank of America and D.E. Shaw & Co, LP said Thursday that they will form a strategic relationship that will provide Bank of America's global corporate client base with access to a range of equity-related products, including equity securities, convertible bonds, equity warrants and options, and customized OTC derivative instruments.
D.E. Shaw is a private investment banking group that specializes in various aspects of the intersection between technology and finance.
Bank of America is a subsidiary of BankAmerica Corp.
The agreement between Bank of America and D.E. Shaw involves a financing relationship which does not result in any ownership interest by either firm in the other.
